title: Bright Beyond, Episode 2
description: This is episode TWO of a multi-part novella serial.Everything Eva Braebel thought she knew has been turned upside down and any hope she had of resuming a somewhat normal life after her time is stasis is gone. The world left her behind and though she's fumbling to catch back up, it isn't going well.Eva's dealt with tough situations before, but could this be the one to finally break her?
author: Theresa Kay
